title: Cannot change DNS server on Pixel 3 XL with Android 11
content:
I have a PiHole setup on my network and my Pixel 3 Xl is the only device that will not let me change the DNS server. I have troubleshooted for a few days with no luck. Any help?

Android 11
Google Fi cell network
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
